# News Website - The Hindu Clone

## Project Overview
A modern, professional news website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features newspaper-style layout, category pages, article management, and SEO optimization.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React Icons
- Next Themes (Dark Mode)

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js app router pages
- `/components` - Reusable React components
- `/lib` - Utility functions and data
- `/public` - Static assets

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow newspaper-style design principles
- Ensure SEO optimization with metadata
- Maintain responsive design for all screen sizes
- Use semantic HTML for accessibility
